channel.title: Setting drops for Enemies
channel.description: hi, I was wondering how you could add/edit monter drops. I searched in the client.java , items2.java and NPCdrops.cfg, but i couldn't find it/make it work. I'm using the Pimpscape source. Can someone please explain me how you can make enemies drop items. thanks

item.title: Setting drops for Enemies
item.dc:creator: @skull_basher skull_basher
item.description:
@skull_basher wrote:

hi,
I was wondering how you could add/edit monter drops. I searched in the client.java , items2.java and NPCdrops.cfg, but i couldn’t find it/make it work. I’m using the Pimpscape source.
Can someone please explain me how you can make enemies drop items. thanks

Read full topic
